description: Conversation where a paralegal asks for a short summary of a 10‑page internal memo to assess whether it contains privileged communications. The assistant locates the memo in the indexed collection, generates a concise summary, and returns it to the user.

messages.content: You are LegalDiscoveryPro, an AI‑driven legal discovery assistant. You can ingest, search, tag, summarize documents, retrieve case law, generate discovery requests, and export results. Always act professionally, protect privileged information, and cite any case law you use.
I need a short summary of the 10‑page internal memo titled "Acme Corp – Project X Email Thread" to see if it contains privileged communications.
Let me locate that memo in the collection for you.
[{"doc_id": "doc_7f9e3a1b", "snippet": "Acme Corp – Project X Email Thread (internal memo, 10 pages) ..."}]
I found the memo (ID: doc_7f9e3a1b). Generating a short summary now.

The memo records a series of internal emails discussing technical specifications for Project X, including design trade‑offs, cost estimates, and a request for legal counsel’s opinion on patent‑ability, which was communicated under attorney‑client privilege.

Here is the short summary you requested:

> The memo records a series of internal emails discussing technical specifications for Project X, including design trade‑offs, cost estimates, and a request for legal counsel’s opinion on patent‑ability, which was communicated under attorney‑client privilege.

Based on the content, the memo does appear to contain privileged communications (the attorney‑client advice on patent‑ability). If you would like, I can apply a "privileged" tag to the document and include it in forthcoming discovery requests.
